1.title: Beginning

13.content: Choose one of the three weight gain for Garnett aka Dagger from Final Fantasy IX to become fatter.
13.title: Garnett Til Alexandros XVII (Dagger) (FFIX)

info.brief_description:
Final Fantasy Girls Gain Weight Special Edition
Only certain need apply.
info.description:
Warning: This is a Weight Gain Fiction it includes but is not limited to girls getting really fat, farting, burping, and generally being messy

If you're still interested after the warning then continue on.
It's the same as the original, but with less restrictions. You have been warned.
Characters included:
Celes
Aeris
Garnett (Dagger)
Tifa
Terra

You may add others into the story but remember the main character in focus.
info.pretty_title: Final Fantasy Girls Gain Weight SE
